name: August Coppola
summary: August Coppola. August Coppola was born on 16 February 1934 in Hartford, Connecticut, USA. August was previously married to Martine Chevallier, Marie J. Thenevin and Joy A. Vogelsang. August died on 27 October 2009 in Los Angeles, California, USA.

castMovies.title: The Sorcerer's Apprentice
castMovies.description: (with memories of - as Dr. August Coppola)
